Pre-Game Insights: Gareth Southgate may make significant changes to the starting XI.
England have been solid defensively and the draw has been kind to them, with a favourable run to the final, but they cannot underestimate Slovakia.
Post-Match Reflections: It's do or die for England and Gareth Southgate as they face Slovakia on Sunday in the Euro 2024 round of 16.
Miscellaneous Highlights: England v Slovakia will be shown live on ITV1 with live coverage from 3:30pm.
You can live stream England v Slovakia online via ITVX.
You can listen to the match on BBC Radio 5 Live.
